section.title: String Functions
section.programlisting: select c from Customer c where c.firstName='CAT'

-executing query: Hibernate: select customer0_.CUSTOMER_ID as CUSTOMER1_3_, customer0_.FIRST_NAME as FIRST2_3_, customer0_.LAST_NAME as LAST3_3_ from JPAQL_CUSTOMER customer0_ where customer0_.FIRST_NAME='CAT'

listitem.para: No rows found because 'CAT' does not match anything because of case

section.programlisting: select c from Customer c where c.firstName=LOWER('CAT')

Hibernate: select customer0_.CUSTOMER_ID as CUSTOMER1_3_, customer0_.FIRST_NAME as FIRST2_3_, customer0_.LAST_NAME as LAST3_3_ from JPAQL_CUSTOMER customer0_ where customer0_.FIRST_NAME=lower('CAT')
-found result:firstName=cat, lastName=inhat

listitem.para: One customer found because case-sensitive compare now correct

section.programlisting: select UPPER(c.firstName) from Customer c where c.firstName=LOWER('CAT')

section.programlisting: select TRIM(LEADING 'c' FROM c.firstName) from Customer c where c.firstName='cat')

Hibernate: select trim(LEADING 'c' FROM customer0_.FIRST_NAME) as col_0_0_ from JPAQL_CUSTOMER customer0_ where customer0_.FIRST_NAME='cat'
-found result:at

listitem.para: Customer's name, excluding initial 'c' character, returned

section.programlisting: select c from Customer c where CONCAT(CONCAT(c.firstName,' '),c.lastName) ='cat inhat')

Hibernate: select customer0_.CUSTOMER_ID as CUSTOMER1_3_, customer0_.FIRST_NAME as FIRST2_3_, customer0_.LAST_NAME as LAST3_3_ from JPAQL_CUSTOMER customer0_ where ( ( customer0_.FIRST_NAME||' ' )||customer0_.LAST_NAME )='cat inhat'
-found result:firstName=cat, lastName=inhat

listitem.para: Customer located after concatenation of fields yields match
